name: Outro
_source: s;Simon;Luther, it seems you were right.
s;Simon;We prevailed in the end, despite all odds.
s;Luther;You must have confidence in us, milord.
s;Simon;We may take back our home yet.
s;Luther;And I worry something foul lurks here.
s;Simon;Right, I've heard stories of a dragon dwelling deeper in these caves.
s;Luther;If true, this is quite dire.
s;Luther;Even in my day as a giant slayer, dragons were seen as too grave a threat.
s;Luther;If it ever stirs and attacks the surrounding lands, we're all at risk.
s;Simon;We should make plans to strike then.
